name: Winx Club
overview: In a magical universe, witches, warriors begin fighting in the name of good .vs. evil! At a magic school, five teenage girls are selected to defend the universe with their magic.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: The first season of Winx Club premiered on January 28, 2004 through March 3, 2004 in Italy, and on June 19, 2004 through December 11, 2004 on 4Kids TV. |Main Villains:The Trix, Icy, Darcy and Stormy

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Winx Club is an Italian animated television series, created by Iginio Straffi and produced by Rainbow S.p.A.. The series is aimed toward children between the ages of five and twelve and has spawned an international franchise of toys, books, clothing, DVDs, as well as two CGI feature films. The second season of Winx Club premiered on April 19, 2005 through July 14, 2005 in Italy, and on September 10, 2005 through March 11, 2006 on 4Kids TV. |Main Villains:Lord Darkar

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: The third season of Winx Club premiered on January 29, 2007 through March 28, 2007 in Italy, and on September 30, 2006 through September 22, 2007 on 4Kids TV. |Main Villains:Valtor

seasons.name: Season 4
seasons.overview: Winx Club season four is part of the list of seasons that goes with the series Winx Club. |Main Villains:Wizards of the Black Circle, Duman, Gantlos, Anagan and Ogron

seasons.name: Season 6
seasons.overview: The Winx face their greatest challenge yet when a new witch named Selina arrives with a powerful, evil book known as the Legendarium.

seasons.name: Season 7
seasons.overview: In this adventure the fairies discover the real importance of the rare Fairy Animals, which they must save from Kalshara, an evil shape-shifter and her clumsy brother, Brafilius.

seasons.name: Season 8
seasons.overview: The Winx Club notices that some of the stars in the sky are disappearing. They determine that the return of Valtor is linked to this strange occurrence. The fairies travel to Lumenia, the Magic Dimension's brightest star and the light source for Stella's home planet of Solaria. Lumenia's queen gives them the power of Cosmix to protect the magical universe's billions of stars. Along the way, the Winx also meet Twinkly; a helpful golden creature who powers the very core of Lumenia.

episodes.name: It Feels Like Magic
episodes.overview: Bloom first discovers her Winx powers by attacking Mr. Knut; Mr. Knut tries to steal Stella's and Bloom's powers; the Winx and warriors defeat Mr. Knut; Stella takes Bloom to Alfea.

episodes.name: More Than High School
episodes.overview: Bloom arrives at Alfea but lies about her name and says she's Princess Veranda (anyone who is not on the list will be turned into something slimy). Stella introduces Bloom to her roomates - the other Winx Club members. The Senior Witches and Mr. Knut show up again and almost kick Bloom's butt until the other 4 Winx members kick their butts.

episodes.name: Save the First Dance
episodes.overview: The Winx Club members and the warriors prepare for the school dance; the witches try to steal Stella's ring. Bloom takes on the witches by herself and transforms for the first time, but loses Stella's ring.

episodes.name: The Voice of Nature
episodes.overview: The girls are on a field trip to practice the skills to ""listen to nature."" In the meanwhile, Nutt tells the witches that a few specialists are escorting the troll to Magix. Fearing that a mind sorceror might get a hold of the troll and discover their plan, they break the troll out. The specialists and fairies team up to find the troll, but the witches beat them to it and make the troll disappear forever. With no sign of the troll, the specialists head back to Red Fountain and the girls return to their class.

episodes.name: Date With Disaster
episodes.overview: Stella gets asked on a mystery date with Prince Sky and end up being stolen by the witches and Mr. Knut. Meanwhile, the Winx Club is making a good decision potion. One of the witches impersonates Stella and asks for Stella's ring in exchange to free her. Bloom gives the ring up.

episodes.name: Secret Guardian
episodes.overview: The Winx Club attempts to go to Cloud Tower to get Stella's ring back, but are in for more then they bargained for, when they are surrounded by beetles! Stella burns one of the beetles, but ends up surronding them with fire! Bloom hears a voice in her head telling her to escape through an invisible door.

episodes.name: Grounded (aka Friends in Need)
episodes.overview: The Winx girls and the Red Fountain guys have a cleaning party as a ""punishment"" for going to Cloud Tower, when the witches conjure up a minotaur to take them down. The Winx Club is useless without their powers, but defeat the minotaur anyhow. Impressed, Gricelda gives their powers back.

episodes.name: The Day of the Rose
episodes.overview: It's the day of the Rose! A day where you celebrate your parents. Most of the school have gone home, leaving Musa, Stella and Bloom behind. While Musa stays at Alfea, Stella and Bloom decide to go to Magix and watch the annual race with their favorite guys as the racers! But tension is stirred when some harsh words are exchanged between Riven and Bloom. To make things worse, Darcy has successful managed to sabotage the race and cast a spell on Riven, making him think Darcy is his girlfriend!

episodes.name: Spelled
episodes.overview: Bloom is still troubled by her mysterious dreams but that's the least of her concerns when Stella becomes rude and says mean things to each member of the Winx, causing Musa to run off crying! Unfortunatly, Musa runs to Magix where the witches are currently hanging out. A big fight ensures with the witches vs. fairies and warriors. In the end, Bloom releases an insane amount of energy. Thus, the witches now know where the dragon power is.

episodes.name: Magical Reality Check
episodes.overview: The girls take a virtual reality game where they are only allowed to take one potion and rely on their Winx for the rest. Bloom is first, and the witches invade the game, knock Kikko in the lava, and steal Bloom's dragon fire. The game is about to blow up and Bloom is still trapped inside. Bloom finds Kikko and they fix the VR chamber and Bloom is found. Then it turns out the witches have no dragon fire.

episodes.name: Junior League
episodes.overview: When Flora makes a potion to repel the witches, some of her experiments start to give Stella and Techna problems. After an arguement, Flora decides to finish her experiments at Black Mud Swamp. Feeling guilty, Bloom takes the rest of the girls to help Flora. Flora needs one more ingredient to finish the potion and needs to get it from the Junior League of the Swamp. The Junior League decides they will give the girls the last ingredient if they can destroy a monster taking food from the swamp. After saving Musa from a giant turtle the girls go on the island to destroy the monster. The girls find out the monster is a tree/parasite and Flora and Bloom destroy it. The girls come back telling them the monster has been destroyed and the League give them the flower. Unforetunately, the League is in trouble from the food shortage and need to move on. But at the end, Flora helps them out with her invention the Vegal Cloner to regrow back their food and Stella and Techna apologize.

episodes.name: Miss Magix
episodes.overview: Stella decides to take part in the annual Miss Magix Beauty Pageant instead of studing for an exam.  Thinking she'll be the sure-fire winner, she's not too concerned about the compatition.   However, just to get the kicks and daily dose of 'make the fairies cry', the senior witches enter their own 'Miss Magix' into the Beauty Pageant, as well as sabotaging the acts. Can she figure out what's going on before it's too late?

episodes.name: Meant to Be
episodes.overview: Bloom's mother's flower store is almost stolen.

episodes.name: Pushing the Envelope
episodes.overview: Bloom finds the answer to a quiz in which they will be expelled is she does not pass; Gricelda takes Bloom on an astral journey to reveal Daphne, the voice in her head. Bloom hides the answers to the test but the other Winx girls try to get them anyway. Flora tries to hide the answers but then returns it to the teacher. Then it realizes the quiz was just a ""pop quiz"" because the envelope ""pops"" when you open it, to see what what happen if you tried to cheat.

episodes.name: The Nightmare Monster
episodes.overview: The scene starts with the witches summoning a nightmare gargoyle. It attacks each member of the Winx, (with the exception of Bloom), and gets stronger as each girl is drained from the nightmares. Lucky for us, Mirta (who's still stuck as a pumpkin) informs the girls what's really going on. On the second night, The girls prepare to ambush it, but the witches show up and completely pummel them. That is, until Faragonda appears, kicks the nightmare monster's butt, and chases the witches. The witches retreat only to discover that they are expelled from Cloudtower.

episodes.name: Royal Heartbreak
episodes.overview: A princess comes and claims that she's the fiancÃ© of Prince Sky and she's willing to fight for his heart.

episodes.name: Senior Witches Go to Earth
episodes.overview: Feeling guilty about getting her friends in trouble, Bloom goes back home to Earth. The witches follow her, and a fight ensues. In the end, Bloom loses the dragonfire!

episodes.name: The Army of Decay
episodes.overview: Icy, Stormy and Darcy versus off with Techna, Musa, Flora and Stella in a battle for the dragonfire.

episodes.name: Sparks of Hope
episodes.overview: Bloom must regain her powers from the witches as the others fight the army of decay.

episodes.name: The Frozen Palace
episodes.overview: Bloom and the other Winx girls are on Sparks looking for Bloom's dragonfire in the frozen palace. Then a huge yeti like monster with a hoard of fire crabs assaults the girls and the palace. The Red Fountain boys (minus one Riven) turn up and stop the fire crabs then the girls stop the yeti. It ends with all 8 of them in the boys craft, heading back to Alfea.

episodes.name: Mission to Cloud Tower
episodes.overview: The Winx girls and the Red Fountain boys (minus Riven) journey back to Cloud Tower from Sparx to reclaim Bloom's dragonfire.

episodes.name: The Search for the Flame
episodes.overview: To expedite the search, the gang splits into two groups. Bloom's group finds the dragon fire first but darn, the witches are waiting for them. Luckily, the other group (Riven, Brandon, and Knut) show up as well as Ms. Griffin! To buy time, Griffin put the three witch-dropouts in temporary ""detention"", and then summons a portal to Alfea so that the remaining witches and gang can escape. Fearing that the army of decay might also enter the portal, Sky and Bloom stay behind to lead the army away.

episodes.name: Battle for Alfea
episodes.overview: Bloom and Brandon crash their vehicle in the forest, and a voice tells Bloom to go to Lake Crescent; Griffin joins the Alfea side and they defeat the Army of Decay.

episodes.name: The Great Witch Invasion
episodes.overview: While the witches mount a final attack on Alfea with the Army of Decay vs. the Red Fountain Boys, Cloud Tower Witches and all the Alfea fairies, Bloom goes to find Daphne and she regains her power. She also saves Brandon in Magix from three Army of Decay monsters. In the background, Mirta gets turned back into a human and Riven admits he likes Musa.

episodes.name: Fire and Ice (aka The Final Battle)
episodes.overview: The witches attempt to destroy Alfea once and for all, but then Bloom returns with the dragonfire. She takes down Icy while the other four take down Stormy and Darcy. In the end, Icy, Stormy and Darcy are sent to a goody goody boot camp while all the other witches go back to clean up Cloud Tower. Red Fountain boys stay at Alfea and they all have Prom together.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: The first season of Winx Club premiered on January 28, 2004 through March 3, 2004 in Italy, and on June 19, 2004 through December 11, 2004 on 4Kids TV. |Main Villains:The Trix, Icy, Darcy and Stormy

episodes.name: Back to School
episodes.overview: The new school year begins at Alfea, but in a evil realm called the Under-Realm, in a place calles ShadowHuant, a group of pixies: Amore, Blinky, Chatta, Digit, Lockette, Piff, Tune and Zing, are trapped in the dungeon of ShawdowHuant located in a cell that is taking all of their powers. Their best friend, Layla, a fairy princess from the Realm of Tides, goes to the Under-Realm to try and save her best friends, while she must also fight for her life in the Palace of ShadowHuant. Layla is also losing most of her powers and that is making it harder to try and rescue her friends.

episodes.name: Princess of Tides
episodes.overview: Layla is out cold in the bedroom of the Winx Club and Lord Darkar goes to the Light Haven -- the Do-Gooder's boot camp where Icy, Stormy, and Darcy are being held. He breaks them out to become his evil army. He also gives them a major upgrade on their powers.

episodes.name: Into the Under Realm
episodes.overview: Faragonda decides to test the winx club on going to the Under-Realm but only Bloom,Stella,and Layla pass. Sky and Brandon accompany the girls on their mission but upon arrival run into a group of monsters whose quick defeat costs the fairies most of their winx! The mission becomes even more difficult when Stella and Brandon fall into a dark chasam.

episodes.name: Queen of Perfection
episodes.overview: Stella and Brandon fall into an underground river at the bottom of the chasam which sucks them down the current into a whirlpool and onto the shores near an underground kingdom called Downland where they are found by a palace guard and a centry named Sponsus who takes the couple to Amentia the perfectionist and queen of Downland. Amentia sees Brandon and takes him for her husband! A devestated and weakened Stella must soon find the sun to renew her winx or her friends will become monster chow!

episodes.name: Rescuing the Pixies
episodes.overview: Layla, Bloom, Stella, and Sky successfully reach ShadowHuant. Meanwhile, Layla saves the remaining pixies and later a mysterious man appears and rescues the four of them from the witches.

episodes.name: My Boyfriend's Wedding
episodes.overview: After saving the pixies, Bloom, Stella, Layla and Sky go to Downland to stop Queen Amentia from marrying Brandon.

episodes.name: The Dark Tower
episodes.overview: A mysterious large dark towers appear near Alfea.  As the Winx Club attempts to destroy it, their powers are drained!

episodes.name: Party Monster
episodes.overview: The new campus for Red Fountain opens.  The Winx Club joins in the grand opening celebration and meet Helia, who likes drawing.  But Lord Darkar attacks Red Fountain with a monster, hoping to distract Red Fountain from Icy, Darcy and Stormy, who are trying to steal the codex.

episodes.name: The Angel of Doom
episodes.overview: After careful observation of Professor Avalon, Techna and Digit become convinced that he isn't who he says he is.  They begin researching his past and fear he is the Angel of Doom in disguise.

episodes.name: Reaching for the Sky
episodes.overview: Red Fountain is attacked by a chaos globe!  While the Heroes are busy protecting their campus, the Witches break in and try to steal the codex.  Bloom, Flora and Techna try to help the specialists gaurd the codex.

episodes.name: Homesick
episodes.overview: Lord Darkar hits the pixies with a spell while they're playing which makes them want to go home. The Winx Club must save the pixies and battle the monsters Darkar sends to stop them!

episodes.name: Truth or Dare
episodes.overview: A boy named "Jared" has a crush on Musa, and wants to go out on a date with her. Later, Darcy casts a spell on Jared to jinx the magical chamber, and the Winx Club must combine their powers to beat the monster.

episodes.name: Gangs of Gardenia
episodes.overview: When Bloom decides to go back to Earth, Layla, Musa, and Stella decide to join her. When some gangsters catch Musa using magic, it's up to the Pixies to save them!

episodes.name: The Wrong Righters
episodes.overview: Sky, Bloom, Brandon, Flora, Lockette, and Zing attempt save Princess Diaspro from a a band of goodie goodies known as the Wrong Righters who attempt teach Diaspro a lesson in kindness and helping others.

episodes.name: Magic in My Heart
episodes.overview: Musa faces her greatest challenge ever when she must face a huge audience including her father but evil crashes the party and Stormy threatens to destroy Musa's father! Music power is put to the ultimate test to save the concert and Musa's beloved father.

episodes.name: The Fourth Witch (a.k.a. Hallowinx)
episodes.overview: The girls are invited to an Halloween party on Earth by Bloom's old rival Mitzy.  The party is held in a mansion that is said to be haunted by the ghosts of three witches looking for their long lost sister.

episodes.name: Exchange Students
episodes.overview: Bloom and the rest of the Winx go to Cloud Tower to learn more about Dark Magic from the witches. Mirta and Zing go along to help out.  While the girls are there, Cloud Tower is attacked by Icy, Darcy, and Stormy, who try to steal another piece of the codex!

episodes.name: Heart of Cloud Tower
episodes.overview: Griffin takes back control of the Heart of Cloud Tower, providing temporary relief and a glimmer of hope. But Senior Witches soon locate the part of the codex. The Winx overwhelmed by the power of the their enemies fall back on their one last chance, convergence.

episodes.name: Shadows In Bloom
episodes.overview: Bloom is angry for loosing two pieces of the Codex to the witches and turns to Avalon for advice. While undergoing regression therapy with professor Avalon a mysterious dark energy takes hold of Bloom. While her friends worry about her well being, Bloom ultimately makes her way to the secret room to steal Alfea's part of the Codex.

episodes.name: The First Charmix
episodes.overview: While The Winx leave for a getway resort, Avalon shows his true loyalties and tricks a pixie into going back to Pixie village.  Icy follows to retrieve the codex.

episodes.name: Trouble In Paradise
episodes.overview: Icy, Darcy and Stormy turn the creatures of the Resort Realm against the winx club girls.

episodes.name: Last Resorts
episodes.overview: Seemingly trapped by the Witches, the Winx girls and the heroes have to work together in the fight for their lives! With Timmy as head strategist, they set a trap for the Witches.

episodes.name: Darkness And Light
episodes.overview: Flora, Helia, Sky, Brandon, and Layla go to the pixie village for essence from the flower of life to cure the sneezing pixies but find out it was destroyed in the battle between Icy and Livy for the codex. Ninfea encourages Flora to heal the flower of life. Meanwhile back at Alfea the Bloom, Stella, Musa, Techna and Layla Charmix train to fight Darkar. Then Musa Stella and Techna find the real Professor Avalon revealing the other to be a fake right before he kidnaps Bloom!

episodes.name: Desperately Seeking Bloom
episodes.overview: Bloom is in Darkar's captivity so he can unite Dragon Fire with Shadow Fire and open the portal to Realix.  The Winx Club and Heroes must head for Shadowhaunt and rescue Bloom! Fortunately Amentia and the guards will help them as well, but it's too late-Darkar has turned Bloom into evil!

episodes.name: Storming Shadowhaunt
episodes.overview: The magical universe enters its darkest hour as Bloom (who has turned evil) and Darkar(who has dumped the witches) combine powers to enter Realix. The Winx Club and warriors enter Shadowhaunt where they face Kerbog who has been yet again transformed into an extinct magical creature called an Octaceraton! The five fairies powers have no effect on it and when the Teachers show up to help. Is there any hope of saving Bloom?

episodes.name: The Ultimate Power Couple
episodes.overview: The teachers (Faragonda, Griffon, and Codatorta) and the Pixie Elders (Athena, Discorda, Ninfea, and Concorda) help the Winx Club.  With Stella's help, they are able to open another portal into Realix and the Winx Club go to save Bloom.  Meanwhile, upset that Darkar dumped them, Icy, Darcy and Stormy use their powers to combine and turn into MegaTrix and they take on Darkar.  The Winx Club tries to battle Darkar to release her from his spell, but are unsuccessful.  While Darkar is busy battling the MegaTrix, the Heroes show up and Sky tries to talk to Bloom.  Will love save her and the entire realm from Darkar?

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: Winx Club is an Italian animated television series, created by Iginio Straffi and produced by Rainbow S.p.A.. The series is aimed toward children between the ages of five and twelve and has spawned an international franchise of toys, books, clothing, DVDs, as well as two CGI feature films. The second season of Winx Club premiered on April 19, 2005 through July 14, 2005 in Italy, and on September 10, 2005 through March 11, 2006 on 4Kids TV. |Main Villains:Lord Darkar

episodes.name: The Princess' Ball
episodes.overview: Stella learns that her father is throwing her a Princess Ball - a grand coming out party for royalty and sets out to buy the most beautiful dress in all the realms. But Chimera, a bratty fairy, from Beta Academy wants the same dress and vows to get it first.

episodes.name: Beauty Is A Beast
episodes.overview: Chimera and Baltor team up to ruin Stella’s Princess Ball and maybe the rest of her life.

episodes.name: Pretty Pretty Princess
episodes.overview: The Winx Club must find a way to turn Stella from a beast back to her beautiful self.

episodes.name: Mirror Of Truth
episodes.overview:
The Winx Club as well as Brandon, Timmy and Sky continue their dangerous journey to the Ice Caves to find the Mirror of Truth and turn Stella back to her usual self.

Then, the Alfea school year starts and the girls are reunited with Layla who tells them of the horrible news from Tides. Also, Ms. Farragonda tells the third years about earning their Enchantix!

episodes.name: Mission To Tides
episodes.overview: Bloom, Flora, Techna, Musa, and Layla all journey to the Realm of Tides. Stella stays behind at Alfea to make sure the teachers don't find out that they left campus without permission.

episodes.name: The Mermaid Queen
episodes.overview: The Winx Club head to the bottom of the ocean where they come across a legendary sea monster and try to gain Layla's sight back.

episodes.name: Royal Behavior
episodes.overview: The gang tries to escape detention, and to get to a party on Erakylion. Meanwhile, Layla and Stella teach Bloom princess demeanor. Baltor once again is up to no good with the witches and even Princess Diaspro. Mrs. Faragonda lets us in on some secrets about Blooms mysterious past.

episodes.name: Dark Sky
episodes.overview: It's Erakylion's Millenium Party and Princess Diaspro has a few tricks up her sleeve for Bloom and Prince Sky.

episodes.name: Operation Boyfriend Rescue
episodes.overview: Can Bloom and the Winx Club save Sky from Diaspro's evil clutches before its too late?

episodes.name: Attack of the Zombie Witches
episodes.overview: Baltor takes over Cloud Tower and brings the witches under his control and forces them to attack Alfea after he imprisons Griffin. Fairies fight the witches while Baltor goes into battle with Farragonda!

episodes.name: Missing In Action
episodes.overview: As the Winx Club go out on a search for Faragonda they find themselves at Cloud Tower- face to face with Baltor!

episodes.name: Tears From The Black Willow
episodes.overview: The Winx Club go to Flora's home planet seeking guidance in breaking the spell cast on Ms. Faragonda. Flora's younger sister, Miele, tags along. Flora earns her Enchantix after saving her sister from the poisoned tears of the Black Willow and dumps the trix (who are sent to stop them from gathering the tears) into the Black Willow's tears where they turn into little girls.

episodes.name: Pay back
episodes.overview: Anguished with the loss of Tecna, the five Winx Club go to confront Valtor at Cloudtower.

episodes.name: The island of dragons
episodes.overview: Bloom arrives on Pyros, an island inhabited by dragons, where she is instantly attacked and becomes stranded. She meets a dragon who is friendly and teaches her how to be a dragon. Meanwhile, back at Redfountain, Timmy dedicates all his time into finding Tecna in the Omega Dimension through his computers.

episodes.name: The power within
episodes.overview: Bloom continues her exploration of Pyros and encounters a sorceress named Mya, who offers to train Bloom and help her become stronger. Meanwhile, the Winx Club and the Specialists arrive at Tecna's approximate location in the Omega Dimension. Back on Pyros, Bloom must battle the Trix by herself, but by believing in herself and refusing to give in to Valtor, she earns her fullf-ledged Enchantix and goes back to Alfea.

episodes.name: The omega mission
episodes.overview: Sky and Bloom rescue Tecna. After falling off a ledge, Tecna and Bloom find the other Winx girls, who are trapped by ice snakes. With their help, they manage to escape with the Specialists. The Winx Club and the Specialists return to Alfea, where the girls celebrate their reunion with a party.

episodes.name: Day at the museum
episodes.overview: Valtor announces his plan to steal a relic associated with the destruction of Domino. Ophir, who is interested in Aisha (Layla) because she is his bethrothed, aids the Winx in defending the museum.

episodes.name: Biker chick wedding crashers
episodes.overview: Countess Cassandra announces plans to marry Stella's father, prompting Stella and the Winx Club to crash the wedding. The boys help them ride their bikes so they can act like a bike gang, due to the tight security. In the end, Stella reverses the effects of Cassandra's magic on her father.

episodes.name: Little big shots
episodes.overview: While the Winx Club are away on a mission, their Pixies defend their village from Icy, Stormy, and Darcy winning in the end.

episodes.name: The golden kingdom
episodes.overview: The Winx club proceeds with a plan to negate and ultimately defeat Valtor by going to the Golden Kingdom. Ophir becomes a stowaway on their mission. They are attacked by pegagaurds and are left unconscious.

episodes.name: The crystal labyrinth
episodes.overview: In order to obtain the Water Stars that can defeat Valtor, Stella, Musa, and Tecna must find their way through a maze with obstacles testing their commitment to possess the Stars.

episodes.name: The wizard's challenge
episodes.overview: Valtor challenges the three headmasters of the schools to a duel. The Winx Club determines the duel a diversion to occupy the headmasters while the real Valtor breaks into Alfea.

episodes.name: The witches' crypt
episodes.overview: The Winx Club go to find the missing Cloudtower crypts to contact the three witches who destroyed Domino. Meanwhile, Valtor endows the Trix with Disenchantix abilities which the Winx"s destroy with combined fairy dust.

episodes.name: The spell of the elements
episodes.overview: Valtor releases a spell of the four elements, fire, water, wind, and earth, to conquer Magix. The Winx Club are determined to stop him once and for in the end every one except Bloom thinks that Valtor is gone for good.

3.name: Season 3
3.overview: The third season of Winx Club premiered on January 29, 2007 through March 28, 2007 in Italy, and on September 30, 2006 through September 22, 2007 on 4Kids TV. |Main Villains:Valtor

episodes.name: The Wizards of the Black Circle
The Tree of Life
episodes.overview: The girls learn about their new enemy, known as the Wizards of the Black Circle, who stole the magic from Earth, and that there is one last fairy that they are looking for. Now, the Winx Club must use the Tree of Life in Pixie Village to travel to Earth and find that fairy — but they must first battle a monster that has caused all the Pixies to mysteriously vanish.

episodes.name: Love & Pet
episodes.overview: While Love & Pet slowly becomes popular in Gardenia, the Wizards of the Black Circle arrive on Earth and begin their search for the last Earth fairy. Meanwhile, the Specialists have recently arrived on Earth, where Sky discovers Bloom with Andy, an old friend of hers.

episodes.name: Mitzi's Present
episodes.overview: The Wizards invade Love & Pet and bewitch several of the animals. The Winx girls must round them up and find a way to reverse the spell. Meanwhile, Mitzi shows her affection for Brandon after he saves her from one of the bewitched animals. This begins to infuriate Stella.

episodes.name: A Fairy in Danger
episodes.overview: Both the Winx girls and the Wizards of the Black Circle discover the identity of the last Fairy on Earth —Roxy, a waitress at the Frutti Music Bar. A huge battle ensues between both sides over the new girl and only her belief in magic can help the Winx Club turn the tide. The Winx girls earn their Believix after Roxy believes in fairies.

episodes.name: Winx Believix
episodes.overview: Thanks to Roxy, the Winx girls have earned their Believix, but their powers have still not fully evolved. Meanwhile, Roxy is being chased all over Gardenia by the Wizards, while a mysterious female voice encourages Roxy to accept her magical powers.

episodes.name: Nebula
episodes.overview: As Bloom tries to reassure Sky that she and Andy are just friends, Roxy, while holding the White Circle, is possessed by anger and rage and goes to take on the Wizards of the Black Circle.

episodes.name: Musa's Song
episodes.overview: Musa's singing attracts the attention of a record manager named Jason, who offers her a record deal. Riven's jealousy toward Jason causes him and Musa to drift farther apart. Meanwhile, the other Winx girls and Roxy suffer many failed attempts to get the people of Gardenia to believe in fairies. Only when the girls help extinguish a fire created by the Wizards do the people slowly regain their belief in magic.

episodes.name: Dad! I'm a Fairy
episodes.overview: Roxy discovers that the Wizards have abducted her father, and she is captured herself when she gets home to inform her father of her magical abilities. Artù, Kiko and the Love & Pet animals mount a rescue mission to save both of them, but Artù is injured by Gantlos in the process, which allows Roxy to awaken her dormant fairy form.

episodes.name: The Wizard's Attack
episodes.overview: Roxy is put to the ultimate test when the Wizards of the Black Circle threatens to destroy all of Gardenia and its citizens if she does not surrender.

episodes.name: 7: The Perfect Number
episodes.overview: The Winx girls and Roxy must deal with their new popularity within Gardenia while also dealing with a pair of animal smugglers.

episodes.name: Magic Lessons
episodes.overview: The Winx girls' new popularity infuriates the Wizards of the Black Circle, so in a plot to make people hate fairies, they offer to transform Mitzi and her two friends into fairies. Meanwhile, Jason invites Musa to his wedding, and the Winx girls teach Roxy the basics of being a fairy.

episodes.name: A Virtual World
episodes.overview: Tecna reveals that she has created a virtual world in her computer to hide the White Circle, but while the girls go to perform at the Frutti Music Bar, the Wizards enter the virtual world to find it.

episodes.name: The Enchanted Island
episodes.overview: The Winx girls travel to the island from a vision of Roxy's, the mystical world of Tir Nan Og sealed within the White Circle. Upon arriving, a mysterious figure keeps calling out to Roxy and a dark force soon abducts the Winx, taking them to the prison of all Earth's fairies. After freeing the Earth fairies, they reveal that they want revenge against the humans who imprisoned them, and declare war against all of humanity in turn.

episodes.name: The Nature Rage
episodes.overview: Diana, the Earth Fairy of Nature, begins the war against humanity by transforming Gardenia into a huge jungle. The Winx girls must deal with this new menace, plus the kidnapping of their boyfriends, except for Nabu, who held strong against Diana. In the process, they learn from Miss Faragonda that there's another level of transformation for a fairy, an evolution of Believix, called Sophix.

episodes.name: In Diana's Kingdom
episodes.overview: The Winx gain their Sophix powers as they enter the Amazon Rainforest, where Diana has made her new lair, but after they split up, Flora, Musa and Layla are captured while saving the Specialists. Meanwhile, Bloom, Stella, and Tecna locate the source of Diana's power: the Sacred Bud.

episodes.name: The Gifts of Destiny
episodes.overview: The Winx Club and the Specialists manage to escape Diana's fortress as they realize that the Sacred Bud is connected to her; the more of the forest that is destroyed, the more Diana is weakened. The girls must save the forest as well as Diana, and also somehow manage to convince her to release Gardenia from its plant prison.

episodes.name: Sibylla's Cave
episodes.overview: The Winx form an unlikely alliance with the Fairy Hunters to help one of them after Duman comes down with an illness. They travel to the Sibillini Mountains in Italy, where they ask the Fairy of Justice, Sibylla, for help.

episodes.name: The Frozen Tower
episodes.overview: Aurora, Fairy of the North, comes to Earth, freezing it over and threatening to send the planet into another Ice Age. The Winx, using another evolution form called Lovix, which is winter-themed, confront Aurora.

episodes.name: Bloom's Trial
episodes.overview: Bloom and the rest of the Winx face off against the fairy of war, Nebula, while also trying to protect Roxy from her. Bloom fights Nebula with the agreement that Nebula drop her campaign for revenge if Bloom wins.

episodes.name: The Day of Justice
episodes.overview: The Winx girls return to Tir Nan Og with the Wizards of the Black Circle, but they end up in the fight of their lives when the magical kingdom is in danger. Nabu makes the ultimate sacrifice to save the kingdom and dies in the process, causing Layla to seek revenge for his death. In the end, she leaves the Winx Club and joins Nebula's army.

episodes.name: Morgana's Secret
episodes.overview: Nebula captures Morgana and conquers the magical kingdom of Tir Nan Og. Then, she leads her army into the Omega Dimension where the remaining Wizards are hiding. After freeing Morgana, Roxy discovers that she is Morgana's daughter. Later, the Winx girls must face Nebula's vengeful army, led by their new lieutenant — Layla. Morgana and the Winx girls are able to convince the Fairies of Vengeance not to seek revenge, but now must also convince Layla and Nebula of the same.

episodes.name: Ice and Fire
episodes.overview: The Wizards of the Black Circle flee as Layla and Nebula chase them toward a dead end. Determined to avenge Nabu, Layla teams up with Nebula to destroy the Fairy Hunters, but both are easily overpowered. The Winx catch up with Layla and Nebula and all eight fairies use convergence to freeze the evil wizards solid. Afterwards, Layla uses the remnants of Nabu's spirit, combined with the powers of the Fairies of Tir Nan Og, to restore the kingdom. Morgana proclaims Nebula the new Queen of Tir Nan Og, and then returns to Earth, where she is reunited with her husband, Klaus, and her daughter Roxy, while Layla returns to the Winx. With Roxy making the decision to study in Alfea and Earth's belief in magic.

4.name: Season 4
4.overview: Winx Club season four is part of the list of seasons that goes with the series Winx Club. |Main Villains:Wizards of the Black Circle, Duman, Gantlos, Anagan and Ogron

episodes.name: The Spill
episodes.overview: In the kingdom of Andros, Aisha's uncle Neptune plans to make his son Nereus a prince, Nereus's twin brother disrupts the crowning ceremony and is sent to prison.

episodes.name: The Rise of Tritannus
episodes.overview: The Winx change their concert, into a benefit to help clean up the oil spill. Meanwhile Tritannus escapes from jail with the help of the Trinx and begins absorbing the oil spill's pollution and slowly begins transforms into a monster.

episodes.name: Return to Alfea
episodes.overview: The girls all head back to Alfea to talk more with Ms. F and read up o a book called The Sirenix. While in the library they are attacked by both the Trinx and Tritannus: who is getting stronger. Sky takes a hard blow to the head.

episodes.name: The Sirenix Book
episodes.overview: Krystal attempts to heal Sky's memory, but the memory of losing the pendant of Eraklyon is causing the blockage, but only Sky knows where it can be found. Timmy helps Tecna update her phone to find the Sirenix Book, which the Trix secretly sabotage. While, searching for the Sirenix Book, the Winx find the fake one, which turns Tecna into a terrifying robot, whose mission is to find the Sirenix Book.

episodes.name: The Lilo
episodes.overview: The Trix show their powers, wondering if they are strong enough to go up against The Winx Club. As the Trix get stronger, so do the Winx.

episodes.name: The Power of Harmonix
episodes.overview: In order to fix this new threat, the Winx must gain a new power, called 'Harmonix'. It not only gives them new outfit, but now they can fight in the air, land, and under water a lot easier.

episodes.name: The Shimmering Shells
episodes.overview: After suffering a humiliating defeat at the hands of the Twisted Sisters, and Tritannus, the girls all head to Aishas underwater world to visit personally with her uncle Neptune. There they meet Pescies, who are the Underwater Pixies of the Sea. The Winx try to get the 'mystical stone: self-confidence" as part of their mission for Sirenix.

episodes.name: Secret of the Ruby Reef
episodes.overview: Tritannus raids King Neptune’s underwater palace and transforms his whole mer family into mutants. Then, thanks to the dark magic of his trident, he manages to absorb all of the magical strength and energy of his father, King Neptune’s, mystical sword. Meanwhile, the Winx Club get a second clue to Sirenix which leads them to Musa's home world, Melody, busy searching for the second gem, the one of Empathy. During a fight with Tritannus, Musa is hit by a powerful dark spell and transforms into a terrible monster, bent on destroying the Winx. The Trix arrive with Tritannus on daphne`s doorstep and force her to tell them about Sirenix.

episodes.name: The Empathy Gem
episodes.overview: Continuing their quest to find all the mystical gems, Bloom, Aisha and Tecna go to Tecna's home world, Zenith, to find the second gem of empathy. Meanwhile, Musa, Flora and Brandon watch over Stella who has accidentally turned into a little kid! Will the Winx find the second gem, and turn Stella back to normal?

episodes.name: Trix Tricks
episodes.overview: During a day of races that are taking place at Alfea with current, & past students of Red Fountain, the Trix attack and create lions out of dark magic to fight the Winx for them.

episodes.name: Test of Courage
episodes.overview: Bloom and some of her friends head to her home world for a celebration, along with Sky. However it is interrupted when the witches cause trouble underwater. Sky is left along with Blooms parents when the are attacked.

episodes.name: Sirenix
episodes.overview: Both Bloom, and the rest of the Winx Club have gained the ability to cross the Gates, but the Witches have stolen Daphne's powers, and can now do do it too.

episodes.name: A Magix Christmas
episodes.overview: Bloom's plans to head home for Christmas are interupted by the Trix. They have trapped the girls at their old school with Ice dragons to keep them at bay.

episodes.name: The Emperor Throne
episodes.overview: After having a picnic on a dirty beach the Winx decide to clean it up, while Stella tries her hand at a fashion show. Meanwhile Tritannusgains more power, but looses his toxic one.

episodes.name: The Pillar of Light
episodes.overview: The Winx battle it out agents in Trix. Sirenix VS Sirenix.

episodes.name: The Eclipse
episodes.overview: As darkness envelopes the magical worlds, everyone looks to Stella to help save them and her father's life.

episodes.name: Faraway Reflections
episodes.overview: Daphne tries to warn Bloom of Tritannus' plans; Mike and Vanessa's attempt to clean up Garbage Island is interrupted by a monster attack.

episodes.name: Inspiration of Sirenix
episodes.overview: The Trix summon the Beast of the Depths and unleash it on Daphne's welcome home party, and the Winx are powerless against it.

episodes.name: The Legendarium
episodes.overview: It's Daphne's first day as the new History of Magic teacher. At Cloud Tower, a witch named Selina wields an evil book known as the Legendarium.

episodes.name: The Flying School
episodes.overview: While visiting Lynphea College, the Winx fight off an attack by the Treants, who have been awakened by Selina and her Legendarium.

episodes.name: Bloomix Power
episodes.overview: With most of the Winx rendered powerless, the Trix take over Lynphea. Daphne looks for a way to control the Treants, but then a new threat emerges.

episodes.name: The Golden Auditorium
episodes.overview: While Daphne brings her class to visit the Golden Auditorium, Selina unleashes the screaming Pandemonium Sprites upon the prestigious music college.

episodes.name: Vortex of Flames
episodes.overview: The kingdom celebrates the joyous occasion of Daphne's princess coronation, but Diaspro is also in attendance, and she's up to no good.

episodes.name: The Lost Library
episodes.overview: After learning about the Legendarium, the Winx travel to the Lost Library of Alexandria so the indestructible book can be locked away for good.

episodes.name: Attack of the Sphinx
episodes.overview: Selina awakens the Sphinx and unleashes it upon the whole city of Alexandria, causing the Winx to halt their search for the Fairy Godmother's diary.

episodes.name: Shrine of the Green Dragon
episodes.overview: The Winx's search for Fairy Godmother Eldora leads them to China. After an attack by the Trix, they meet Lu Wei, the last dragon tamer.

episodes.name: The Secret Greenhouse
episodes.overview: While asking Professor Palladium about their rare flower, the Winx learn that a fairy by the name of Eldora once taught Floral Magic there in Alfea.

episodes.name: Broken Dreams
episodes.overview: While alone on Earth back home in the town of Gardenia, Bloom realizes that Eldora could be nearby. Meanwhile, vampires have infiltrated the area.

episodes.name: Shimmer in the Shadows
episodes.overview: Selina sends the Children of the Night to attack Bloom, but the Winx show up to help her fight them off. Bloom realizes she still needs her friends.

episodes.name: The Fairy Godmother
episodes.overview: Bloom brings the Winx to the Forest of Flowers, where she remembers seeing the mysterious flower as a child while playing with her old friend, Selina.

episodes.name: Mythix
episodes.overview: The Winx head to Tir Nan Og, where Eldora says they can find an item that once belonged to the Legendarium World.

episodes.name: Mystery of Calavera
episodes.overview: To forge the Legendarium Key, the Winx and the Specialists search for the Fantasy Emerald on the sun-drenched Calavera Island.

episodes.name: Zombie Invasion
episodes.overview: The zombie pirates put up a big fight, but the Winx have to find the Fantasy Emerald quick, or they'll get stuck in the Legendarium World forever.

episodes.name: The Curse of Fearwood
episodes.overview: Next, the Winx must retrieve the Silver Spear, said to be hidden in a forest town on Earth where werewolves roam after dark.

episodes.name: The Magic Totem
episodes.overview: Flora finds the totem in the Legendarium World and brings it back to Fearwood to break the curse gripping the town's residents.

episodes.name: Queen for a Day
episodes.overview: With the Legendarium Key forged and in their hands, the Winx head to Cloud Tower to lock the Legendarium, but Selina is determined to stop them.

episodes.name: Stella's Big Party
episodes.overview: After being queen for a day, Stella has to show everyone she's hurt that she's sorry, and her friends help her throw a party to do just that.

episodes.name: A Monster Crush
episodes.overview: To locate Cloud Tower, the Winx need a way to make it visible again. A Spectographic Localizer would work, but they'll need to find one first.

episodes.name: The Music Cafe
episodes.overview: Musa opens a music cafe, and the magical energy it emanates provides much-needed protection for Alfea -- but then Musa's voice is stolen!

episodes.name: The Anthem
episodes.overview: The Winx need to get Musa's voice back from Rumpelstiltskin, but he demands something from them that they're not prepared to give.

episodes.name: Legendary Duel
episodes.overview: In a duel, Bloom goes up against her childhood friend Selina, who needs a spark of Bloom's Dragon Flame to finally free Acheron from the Legendarium.

episodes.name: Acheron
episodes.overview: Daphne makes a big announcement: She's getting married to Thoren! But back in Cloud Tower, Selina successfully frees the evil Acheron into the world.

episodes.name: Winx Forever
episodes.overview: Thanks to the defeat of Acheron, Selina manages to get her powers back. It will be up to her to lock the Legendarium once and for all.

6.name: Season 6
6.overview: The Winx face their greatest challenge yet when a new witch named Selina arrives with a powerful, evil book known as the Legendarium.

episodes.name: The Alfea Natural Park
episodes.overview: Faragonda informs the Winx that they'll be planning the grand opening party for the Alfea Natural Park, a sanctuary for endangered Fairy Animals.

episodes.name: Young Fairies Grow Up
episodes.overview: Using the Stones of Memories, the Winx travel back to a time when Digmoles thrived so they can save them from extinction and uncover their secret.

episodes.name: Butterflix
episodes.overview: A fairy named Kalshara absorbs Wild Magic and becomes a shapeshifter in her pursuit of the Fairy Animals' Ultimate Power.

episodes.name: The First Color of the Universe
episodes.overview: Back in the present, the Digmoles are no longer endangered. They reveal the secret to obtaining the Fairy Animals' Ultimate Power to the Winx.

episodes.name: A Friend from the Past
episodes.overview: Thinking that the ancient CryCry could be the animal they're looking for, the Winx travel back to prehistoric times.

episodes.name: Adventure on Lynphea
episodes.overview: Learning that the Magiwolves are in danger, the Winx travel to Lynphea where Flora learns that mutant fungi are to blame.

episodes.name: Beware of the Wolf
episodes.overview: Just in time, Flora's sister saves the Winx from the mutant fungi, but the fairies will have to find a way to neutralize this threat once and for all.

episodes.name: Back in the Middle Ages
episodes.overview: To protect the Quillcat from Brafilius, the Winx travel back to medieval Italy where they're asked to play fairies in a play.

episodes.name: The Fairy Cat
episodes.overview: After saving the Winx from capture, Orlando brings the fairies to meet the Quillcat, but Brafilius is determined to capture the Fairy Animal first.

episodes.name: Winx Trapped!
episodes.overview: Kalshara takes matters into her own hands and kidnaps Critty. The Winx rush to rescue the Quillcat, but Kalshara captures them, too!

episodes.name: Mission in the Jungle
episodes.overview: There's an emergency on Earth! Shapeshifting monsters are hunting down the endangered Sumatran tiger, and it's up to the Winx to save them.

episodes.name: A Fairy Animal for Tecna
episodes.overview: To fix their damaged Technomagic globe, the Winx travel to Zenith City, the hip and modern realm where the Technomagic geniuses live.

episodes.name: The Unicorn's Secret
episodes.overview: While helping Roxy at the Animal Rescue Park, the Winx learn that the pandas in the Qinling Mountains of China are in danger.

episodes.name: Tynix Transformation
episodes.overview: To their surprise, the Winx learn that their six Fairy Animals are guardians of the Ultimate Power. Meanwhile, Kalshara targets the Dragons of Pyros.

episodes.name: The Magic Stones
episodes.overview: To bring the magic fire back to Pyros, the Winx use their Tynix powers to enter the MiniWorld of Precious Stones together with their Fairy Animals.

episodes.name: Back to Paradise Bay
episodes.overview: The Specialists and the Winx soak in the sun on Paradise Bay, but their vacation is cut short when they hear of a threat to all the island's animals.

episodes.name: Lost in a Droplet
episodes.overview: To restore the balance of nature on Paradise Bay, the Winx need to grow a new Gem of Light by traveling into the Drop MiniWorld.

episodes.name: Banana Day
episodes.overview: When the Winx appear in the Lemurs Forest, Brafilius transforms the bananas into a monster army, putting the Lemurs in danger.

episodes.name: The Magix Rainbow
episodes.overview: After Kalshara tries to steal the magic from the Creature of the Rainbow Mantle, the Winx enter the Rainbow MiniWorld to restore the magical balance.

episodes.name: Baby Winx
episodes.overview: Brafilius transforms the Winx into easily distracted little girls so Kalshara can steal their six Fairy Animals.

episodes.name: It's a Crazy, Crazy World!
episodes.overview: Something has caused the weather in Ethiopia to go haywire. To get to the bottom of it all, the Winx enter the Sundial MiniWorld.

episodes.name: The Kingdom of Diamonds
episodes.overview: Realizing the significance of the diamond Digmole statue in Faragonda's office, the Winx shrink down and enter it in search of the Ultimate Power.

episodes.name: The Secret of Alfea
episodes.overview: Finally free and with the Ultimate Power in their hands, the Trix rush to overtake Alfea, but the Winx are there to stop them.

episodes.name: The Golden Butterfly
episodes.overview: To restore light to the heart of Alfea, the Winx go back in time to search for the Golden Butterfly, recruiting the help of a young Faragonda.

episodes.name: New Magic Harmony
episodes.overview: Just as the Winx manage to defeat the Trix, the Golden Butterfly emerges from its cocoon and spreads fairy dust across the MiniWorld.

episodes.name: The Power of the Fairy Animals
episodes.overview: To save her brother, Kalshara proposes a truce and teams up with the Winx to fight the Trix -- but Kalshara's motives aren't as selfless as they seem.

7.name: Season 7
7.overview: In this adventure the fairies discover the real importance of the rare Fairy Animals, which they must save from Kalshara, an evil shape-shifter and her clumsy brother, Brafilius.

episodes.name: Between the Earth and The Sea

8.name: Season 8
8.overview: The Winx Club notices that some of the stars in the sky are disappearing. They determine that the return of Valtor is linked to this strange occurrence. The fairies travel to Lumenia, the Magic Dimension's brightest star and the light source for Stella's home planet of Solaria. Lumenia's queen gives them the power of Cosmix to protect the magical universe's billions of stars. Along the way, the Winx also meet Twinkly; a helpful golden creature who powers the very core of Lumenia.
